topic.title: Linkus Server
topic.shortdesc: Release notes for Linkus Server on Yeastar Cloud PBX Instance.

ul.li: Fixed the issue of the push notification for Linkus calls: With Presence set to Do Not Disturb, members in a Ring Group could still receive incoming calls.
Fixed the display issue of extensions: On Linkus Mobile Client, not all registered extensions were displayed on Extension list.
Fixed the issue that members in a queue didn't receive notifications when there are incoming calls.

p.b: This version updates the following, you need to simultaneously upgrade Linkus clients to the latest version (iOS version: 2.9.10; Android version: 2.9.6), or Linkus may not work.

ul.li: Added compatibility with PBX Contacts feature.
Optimized Linkus iOS Push.

section.title: Version 2.5.8
section.p:
Released Date: December 17, 2019
Fixed the following Conference issues.
Display issue of conference members.
Occasionally failed to exit from a conference.

section.title: Version 2.5.1
section.p:
Released Date: December 4, 2019
Optimized the mechanism of applying configuration changes to improve the system stability.
You don't need to click Apply button to reload Asterisk if you save unchanged configurations.
If no Apply button appears after you save some specific configuration changes, then the configurations can be saved without reloading Asterisk.

section.title: Version 2.4.5
section.p:
Released Date: October 25, 2019
Fixed the issue of Linkus login.
Optimized APNs (Apple Push Notification service).

body.p:
Released Date: August 8, 2019
Added support for Resume from Breakpoint. You can resume downloading Voicemail and One-Touch Recordings at the broken point.
Optimized the Voicemail and One-Touch Recordings: Linkus client only displays the voicemail and one-touch recordings that are stored in the current storage location ( System Storage Preference Storage Locations Voicemail & One Touch Recordings ).
Fixed the issue of Linkus Call: The Linkus user in the ring group could not answer the call, which is transferred from another ring group after timeout.
Fixed the issue of Linkus Email: The login QR code could not be displayed if the email was sent to Gmail, Whitebox, and Outlook.
Fixed the issue of Linkus Call: If All Busy Mode for SIP Forking was enabled, the Linkus client, which was a Ring Group member could not receive calls.

ul.li: Optimized the Mi Push for Linkus Android client.
Fixed the Recording issue on Linkus PC client: When Linkus recevied an incoming call via an IVR or a queue and this call was recorded on Linkus, the recording would not be saved on Linkus.

p.b: In this version, we update the iOS certificate, please upgrade to this new version, or the iPhone users wouldn't receive Linkus calls.

ul.li: Updated the iOS certificate.
Optimized Android push notification.
Added Linkus Server Guide link for quick access.

li.p: Changed the default RTP port range to 4000-10000.

ul.li: Improved the Linkus stability.
Optimized Google FCM (FireBase Cloud Messaging) for Linkus.
Fixed known issues.
Fixed known issues.
Improved the Linkus stability.
Added support for forcing logout of Linkus desktop client on Linkus mobile client.
Users can log in Linkus mobile client and Linkus desktop client by a same login link.
Added support for Linkus Windows desktop.
Added support for Chat feature on Linkus.
Added support for Presence feature on Linkus.
Improved the stability of Linkus mobile client.
Optimized Linkus iOS push.
Improved the calling experience on Linkus Android client.
Fixed known issues.
Fixed the issue that Linkus call push would fail.
Optimized the Linkus login link.
Optimized the Linkus email template.
Users could only log in Linkus client by email address.
Improved the security of the Linkus login.
Expand the expiration time of QR code and login link that are in the Linkus email to 24 hours.
Optimized the Linkus Email Template.
Compatible with Yeastar Cloud PBX v81.3.0.12.
Linkus Server is enabled by default.
Added support for selecting all extensions and sending Linkus e-mails to all the extensions.
Optimized call push feature of Linkus client.
Optimized CDR on Linkus client: the CDR will display numbers without outbound prefixes.
Fixed the issue that there was noise when using Linkus client to play system prompts.
Fixed the issue that if Linkus call push was failed, the CPU usage of Linkus server was high.
Fixed the issue that if the web debug log was enabled on the PBX, Conference function on Linkus client could not work.
Fixed the issue that after re-enabling Linkus server, the ring strategy on Linkus client could not work.
Fixed the issue that after re-enabling Linkus server, users could not make outbound calls through Linkus client.
Fixed the Linkus login e-mail issue: if the email subject contains Chinese characters, the email contents would display messy codes.
